Name: activated silica production | sodium sulfate, anhydrite | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Idealized reaction of sodium silicate with sulfuric acid which leads to the precipitation of silicium dioxide (precipitated silica) : Na2SiO3 + H2SO4 -> SiO2 + Na2SO4 + H2O
